author: Mike Allen, Jim VandeHei
title: America faces what feels like a Darwinian moment on coronavirus
description: America is facing what feels like a Darwinian moment where the strong in business, wealth and health are more likely to survive, while many others will sadly wither. Why it matters: The pandemic is exposing — and deepening — many of the nation's great divides…
content:
America is facing what feels like a Darwinian moment where the strong in business, wealth and health are more likely to survive, while many others will sadly wither.
Why it matters: The pandemic is exposing and deepening many of the nation's great divides.
